TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapSchemaImporter extends System.Xml.Serialization.SchemaImporter

summary.span: 在 .NET Framework 内使用来为 WSDL 文档中 SOAP 编码的消息部分生成到 .NET Framework 类型的内部映射。

span.span: Used within the .NET Framework to generate internal mappings to .NET Framework types for SOAP-encoded message parts in a WSDL document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由[Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88)，和类，而从 Web 服务描述语言 （生成客户端代理类或抽象服务器类WSDL) 文档。The class is used by the [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88), and the class, while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 而不是直接使用此类，使用 Wsdl.exe。Instead of using this class directly, use Wsdl.exe. 类具有要生成的 WSDL 文档中定义的一部分元素的.NET Framework 类型的内部映射的方法。The class has methods to generate internal mappings to .NET Framework types for part elements defined in a WSDL document. 仅在 WSDL 文档指定 SOAP 编码，如 SOAP 1.1 规范第 5 节中所述时使用的类。The class is used only when a WSDL document specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public SoapSchemaImporter (System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas schemas);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas schemas) cil managed
Public Sub New (schemas As XmlSchemas)
public: SoapSchemaImporter(System::Xml::Serialization::XmlSchemas ^ schemas);

param.name: schemas
param.span: 对象的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects.

summary.span: 指定 对象（表示 WSDL 文档中定义的 SOAP 编码的消息所使用的 XML 架构），初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying objects representing the XML schemas used by SOAP encoded messages defined in a WSDL document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 编码，如 SOAP 1.1 规范中，第 5 节中定义中指定的 WSDL 文档。SOAP encoding, as defined in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification, is specified in a WSDL document. 而不是创建的实例直接类，而使用 Wsdl.exe。Instead of creating an instance of the class directly, use Wsdl.exe.

span.span: A collection of objects.

param.name: typeIdentifiers
param.span: 一个 对象，指定为 WSDL 文档中定义的绑定生成的类的集合。

span.span: A object that specifies a collection of classes being generated for bindings defined in a WSDL document.

summary.span: 指定 对象（表示 SOAP 编码的消息所使用的 XML 架构）和为 WSDL 文档中定义的绑定生成的类，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying objects representing the XML schemas used by SOAP encoded messages, plus classes being generated for bindings defined in a WSDL document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 编码，如 SOAP 1.1 规范中，第 5 节中定义中指定的 WSDL 文档。SOAP encoding, as defined in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification, is specified in a WSDL document. 而不是创建的实例直接类，而使用 Wsdl.exe。Instead of creating an instance of the class directly, use Wsdl.exe.

span.span: An that specifies the name of an element's type for which a .NET Framework type is being generated.

span.span: A base type for the .NET Framework type being generated.

span.span: to indicate that the type being generated may indirectly inherit from the base type; otherwise, .

summary.span: 为 WSDL 文档中定义的 SOAP 编码的元素部分的类型生成内部类型映射信息，其中该类型指定了基类型。

span.span: Generates internal type mapping information for the type of a SOAP-encoded element part defined in a WSDL document where a base type is specified.

returns.span: 对应于 WSDL 消息部分的派生类型的 .NET Framework 类型映射信息。

span.span: The .NET Framework type mapping information for a derived type corresponding to a WSDL message part.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法类由[Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88)时从 Web 服务描述语言 （生成客户端代理类或抽象服务器类WSDL) 文档。The method of the class is used by the [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88) while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 而不是直接调用此方法，使用 Wsdl.exe。Instead of calling this method directly, use Wsdl.exe. 仅时 WSDL 文档指定 SOAP 编码，如 SOAP 1.1 规范第 5 节中所述，类使用。The class is used only when a WSDL document specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.

summary.span: 为 WSDL 文档中定义的单个 SOAP 编码的元素部分生成内部类型映射信息。

span.span: Generates internal type mapping information for a single SOAP-encoded element part defined in a WSDL document.

param.span: 对象，提供 part 元素的信息。

summary.span: 为 WSDL 文档中定义的单个 SOAP 编码的元素部分生成内部类型映射信息。

span.span: Generates internal type mapping information for a single SOAP-encoded element part defined in a WSDL document.

returns.span: WSDL 消息定义中单个元素部分的 .NET Framework 类型映射。

span.span: The .NET Framework type mapping for a single element part of a WSDL message definition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档生成客户端代理类或抽象服务器类时，类由 Wsdl.exe 工具。The method of the class is used by the Wsdl.exe tool while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 而不是直接调用此方法，使用 Wsdl.exe。Instead of calling this method directly, use Wsdl.exe. 仅时 WSDL 文档指定 SOAP 编码，如 SOAP 1.1 规范第 5 节中所述，类使用。The class is used only when a WSDL document specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification. 此签名当 WSDL 消息包装单部分元素中使用方法。This signature of the method is used when a WSDL message is wrapped within a single part element.

summary.span: 为 WSDL 文档中定义的 SOAP 编码的消息的元素部分生成内部类型映射信息。

span.span: Generates internal type mapping information for the element parts of a SOAP-encoded message defined in a WSDL document.

returns.span: WSDL 消息定义中元素部分的 .NET Framework 类型映射。

span.span: The .NET Framework type mappings for the element parts of a WSDL message definition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档生成客户端代理类或抽象服务器类时，类由 Wsdl.exe 工具。The method of the class is used by the Wsdl.exe tool while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 而不是直接调用此方法，使用 Wsdl.exe。Instead of calling this method directly, use Wsdl.exe. 仅时 WSDL 文档指定 SOAP 编码，如 SOAP 1.1 规范第 5 节中所述，类使用。The class is used only when a WSDL document specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification. 参数值复制到方法，将从 WSDL 文档，包括消息元素包含的部分元素中的消息定义。The parameter values to the method are taken from a message definition in a WSDL document, including the part elements the message element contains.
